item.description:
Dear Boston Volunteers,

As you all know it was a terrifying incident at the Boston Marathon on Monday, 3 victims were killed and approx. 170 were injured.

Some of us were at the finish line within 100ft of the explosion. Some of us ran the Boston Marathon. Some of us volunteered at the finish line.

This is absolutely devastating incident. In tribute to the victims, I am planning on organizing a Free Hugs Campaign at Harvard Square to raise money for the http://onefundboston.org/

We will be holding a sign saying:

"Free Hugs  in Honor of Boston Marathon Victims"

and we will give hugs to our fellow Bostonians on the street in honor of the victims. People may donate money to one fund Boston if they wish to.

Also, please design your own signs and join us. May be something like:

"We are strong, we are Boston"

"We are one Boston"

Time: 11 AM on Sunday

Total number of Volunteers: 2 men and 2 women. (may be more)

Pre Campaign: Please make your signs made prior to the event.

Lot of us, including me saw the explosion. its absolutely horrifying!! Lets get together to do a free hugs campaign infront of Staples at Harvard Square.

Please call me for any questions and suggestions @ 505-301-6872

Thanks

Phani

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Free Hugs Campaign in Honor of Boston Marathon Victims
